config.limitedlives.prop.maxLives.name: Max Lives
config.limitedlives.prop.maxLives.desc: Maximum lives a player can have before being "banned".
config.limitedlives.prop.banType.name: Ban Type
config.limitedlives.prop.banType.desc:
Ban type once the player dies too many times.
Accepts: SPECTATOR, BAN
config.limitedlives.prop.banDuration.des: Length of time (in seconds) the player is banned. Set to 0 to permaban.
config.limitedlives.prop.timeToNewLife.d: Length of time (in seconds) since last death for the player to regain a life. Set to 0 to disable.
config.limitedlives.prop.timeRemainingMe: Length of time (in minutes) between messages announcing time remaining of ban. Set to 0 to disable.
config.limitedlives.prop.healthAdjust.de: How much health to change per death.
config.limitedlives.prop.maxHealthReduct: What's the maximum health reduction allowed before it caps out? Set to 0 to disable cap.
config.limitedlives.prop.announceOnRespa: Should we announce the player their remaining lives on respawn?
limitedlives.banKickReason: You have ran out of lives. You are banned from this server.
limitedlives.spectateForce: You have ran out of lives. You are being forced into spectator mode for %s seconds.
limitedlives.spectateForcePerma: You have ran out of lives. You are being forced into spectator mode permanently.
limitedlives.respawnTimeLeft: You have %s more minute(s) before respawning.
limitedlives.livesRegained: Rejoice! You have regained %s live(s), totalling %s lives remaining.
